# AudioManager

# AudioManager

A singleton class which handles all file requests, uses ToneJS as the audio library.

Kind: global class

  • AudioManager
    • new AudioManager()
    • instance
      • .setNote(pn)
      • .getPlayer(playableNote) ⇒ Tone.Player
      • .setSound(fliepath, key)
      • .playSound(key)
    • static
      • .normalizeSet(pitchClass, classSet) ⇒ String
      • .getKey(note)

# new AudioManager()

Should never be called

# audioManager.setNote(pn)

Add a note to the map.

Kind: instance method of AudioManager

Param Type
pn PlayableNote

# audioManager.getPlayer(playableNote) ⇒ Tone.Player

Get a note's Player.

Kind: instance method of AudioManager

Param Type
playableNote PlayableNote

# audioManager.setSound(fliepath, key)

Create a player for some sound.

Kind: instance method of AudioManager

Param
fliepath
key

# audioManager.playSound(key)

Play sound by player key.

Kind: instance method of AudioManager

Param Type Description
key String Player key.

# AudioManager.normalizeSet(pitchClass, classSet) ⇒ String

Trnasforms notes of type '#' to 'b' in order to access the file's name.

Kind: static method of AudioManager

Param
pitchClass
classSet

# AudioManager.getKey(note)

Calculates a specific note's key.

Kind: static method of AudioManager

Param Type
note PlayableNote
